function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Social construction of hurricanes as acts of nature may limit proactive disease mitigation efforts","Impact":"Reduced cooperation and slower recovery from contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns to raise awareness about the role of human activities in disease propagation","Technologies":"Social media, educational websites, community outreach programs","People":"Communities at risk of contagious diseases","Owner":"Health organizations, local governments"},{"Description":"Information asymmetry in pandemic situations can hinder effective communication and response","Impact":"Misinformation, lack of trust, and delayed or ineffective crisis management","Mitigation":"Transparent and accessible communication channels, sharing of surplus information, and collaboration among stakeholders","Technologies":"Crisis communication platforms, data sharing platforms, collaboration tools","People":"Firms, government agencies, communities","Owner":"Public health authorities, crisis communication professionals"},{"Description":"Surplus information held by some entities during a pandemic may not be effectively shared with others","Impact":"Unequal distribution of critical information, exacerbating the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Data sharing protocols, open access initiatives, and incentivizing information sharing","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms, open access databases, incentivization platforms","People":"Public health authorities, research institutions, government agencies","Owner":"Data sharing platforms, open access initiatives"}]}
